resources.string: Fitness Hub
Lose Weight in 30 Days
backward lunges
basic squats
bicycle crunches
bicycle squat
butt kicks
forward lunges
forward punch
forward slant
glute bend
high knees
hip stretch
jump squat
jumping jacks
jumping lunge
knee raising
knee shaft
leg twisting
legs up
shadow boxing
side punches
single leg up
standing trunk twists
swimming
waving the feet
wide squats

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart, with palms on waist.Take your right leg backward, bend until it reaches 90 degrees and your left leg should be parallel to the ground. Come back to the initial position and repeat the same with left leg..
"

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart and stretch hands parallel to the ground.Bend your knees and extend your buttocks backward as if you are going to sit back into a chair. Make sure that you keep your knees behind your toes and your weight in your heels. Rise back up and repeat.
"

"Lie on your back, lift your shoulders off the mat and raise both the legs. Bring one knee and opposing elbow close to each other by crunching to one side, and bend the other knee.S Return to the starting position and crunch to the opposite side.
"

"Lie on your back, lift your shoulders off the mat and raise both the legs. Bring one knee and opposing elbow close to each other by crunching to one side, and fully extend the other leg. Return to the starting position and crunch to the opposite side.
"

"Stand by stretching the hands parallel to the ground. Now flex your right knee and kick your right heel to your glutes. Bring the right foot down and repeaat the same with the left knee.
"

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart, with palms on waist. Take your right leg forward, bend until it reaches 90 degrees and your left leg should be parallel to the ground. Come back to the initial position and repeat the same with left leg.
"

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart. stretch your left hand forward by holding other hand at chest level. Stretch your right hand forward by holding other hand at chest level.Repeat it.
"

"Initially stand with legs apart double the shoulder-width with hands up. First bend forward towards right leg. Come back to the initial position. Bend forward towards left leg. Come back to the initial position an now bend straight.
"

"Facing towards ground, place your hands and feet on the floor as you bend from the waist and make the glute up. Now lower your glute, facing upwards. Lay on the toes and plams. Come back to the initial position and repeat.
"

"Stand with your feet hip-width apart, stretch hands parallel to the ground and run in place at a steady pace by pulling both the knees alternatively to chest.Do as quickly as you can.
"

"Initially stand with legs apart double the shoulder-width. Your arms straight and your palms facing away from you. Bend your right knee and outstretch your left leg. Now repeat the same with the left knee and right leg.
"

"Initially stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Do the regular squat with hands up. Come back to the initial position and repeat.
"

"Stand in lunges position with feet slightly apart, hands on the thighs. Jump in the air, by spreading your arms and legs simultaneously, reaching your hands upto the sky. Jump back to the starting position and repeat.
"

"Stand with your hands on waist and jump. While landing bring one of the leg forward and the other backward. Again jump, while landing switch the legs.
"

"Stand by stretching the hands parallel to the ground. First raise your left knee and bring it parallel to your arms. Repeat the same with the right knee.
"

"Initially stand with left slight apart and stretch your hands. Stretch your left to left side and punch, at the same time, lift your right leg up. Do punching and leg lifting simultaneously. Repeat the same with right hand punch and left leg up.
"

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart and stretch hands parallel to the ground. With a slight jump, extend your legs.
"

"Begin by lying flat on your back with your legs pulled in and feet flat on the floor. Lift both the legs up, high into the air. Come back to the initial position and repeat.
"

"Initially stand with legs slightly apart. stretch your hands by holding at chest level. Now stretch your right hand little lower to your shoulder and strike. Come back to the initial position. Now stretch your right hand again little above the shoulder and strike. Come back and repeat the same with the left hand.
"

"Begin by lying flat on your back with your legs pulled in and feet flat on the floor. Lift one leg high into the air, while pushing through the heel of the leg on the ground. Lift as high as you can. Now lower the leg and repeat the same with the other leg.
"

"Initially stand in a squat position with legs apart twice the shoulder width. stretch your hands by holding at chest level. First twist your trunk right side then left side and repeat.
"

"Lie down with your face downwards, by stretching your hands forward. Raise your opposite arm and leg alternatively and repeat.
"

"Initially, stand by keeping your palms on waist. Stretch your right leg backward then bring it to forward. Do the same with the left leg as quickly as possible.
"

"Initially stand with your feet apart so there's about 20 inches between your heels. Point your toes out slightly. Your arms straight and your palms facing away from you. Bend your knees and elbows, keep your shoulders over your hips, and lower down so your weight is back in your heels. Then straighten your legs and arms.
"

"Initially stand in a squat position with legs apart twice the shoulder width. stretch your hands. Stretch your hands and punch right side then left side.Repeat it.
"
Cancel
You have completed 30 days workouts. To achieve consistency, repeat the exercise from day one.
Congratulations !
Please set reminder

30-Day workout
1 cup of tea or black coffee without sugar and milk
Oatmeal porridge
1 piece of cheese (salty or low-fat is better)
Some nuts (any nuts with no-salted, almonds, pistachio nuts, cashew nuts, hazelnuts, etc.)
2 pieces of whole-grain toast with vegetables (onions, tomato, lettuce, etc.)
Fruit salad (apple, pear, orange, grapefruit, pineapple, etc.)
Vegetable salad (carrots, tomatoes, sweet peppers, cucumbers, etc.)
Cooked or baked quinoa

Oats with fat-free milk (oatmeal, cracked wheat or barley)
1 cookie (low-sugar or sugar-free is better)
Some pumpkin seeds or pecans
Yogurt (low fat or low sugar is better)
Cooked black bean pasta or chickpea pasta
Any vegetable soup with no salt added
Omelet out of three eggs and some vegetables

2 scrambled eggs (no butter or oil)
Some hummus or mashed potatoes
